## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [positionerId](./react.positioneridparams.positionerid.md) | <code>string</code> | A unique id for the positioner.<!-- -->This is used to map the ref of the tracked component to a unique id and cant be updated without losing track of the component's reference element. |
